memberdef.name: DEFINE_SET_TRAFFIC_LIGHT
memberdef.initializer: template<typename ... Ts> \ decltype(auto) setTrafficLight ## NAME(Ts && ... xs) \ { \ return traffic_light_manager_ptr_->set ## NAME(std::forward<decltype(xs)>(xs)...); \ } static_assert(true, "")

memberdef.name: DEFINE_GET_TRAFFIC_LIGHT
memberdef.initializer: template<typename ... Ts> \ decltype(auto) getTrafficLight ## NAME(Ts && ... xs) \ { \ return traffic_light_manager_ptr_->get ## NAME(std::forward<decltype(xs)>(xs)...); \ } static_assert(true, "")

memberdef.name: FORWARD_TO_HDMAP_UTILS
memberdef.initializer: template<typename ... Ts> \ decltype(auto) NAME(Ts && ... xs) const \ { \ return hdmap_utils_ptr_->NAME(std::forward<decltype(xs)>(xs)...); \ } static_assert(true, "")
